name: AI MIRACLE
description:
Is Amalgamia really who she thinks she is?

Miracle is a game about algorithms, artificial intelligence, sentience and free will.  You play as Amalgamia.

She believes to be a young girl who is trapped in a valley with another girl, Katey.  An old abandoned copper mine is nearby, which is very dark and dangerous.

(This "game" is not finished, but does have an ending. It is also a piece of a greater internet puzzle.)
